 ∙ If the woman is unable to remember the exact date, encourage

 ∙ If the exact date of the LMP is not known and it is late in the pregnancy, ask for the date when the foetal 
movements were first felt. This is known as ‘quickening’ and is felt at around 20 weeks of gestation. This
